title: Welcome to react using react-i18next

description.part1<1></1>: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

Membership Honors Tooltip:
The following years of membership will be honored:
15 years (bronze badge of honor)
25 years (silver badge of honor)
40 years (golden badge of honor)
50 years (golden badge of honor with 50)
50 years and completed the 70th year of life (honorary membership)
Birthdays Tooltip:
Every member receives a greetings card or a letter of congratulations from the board on their 50th and 60th birthdays.
From the 70th birthday and on every further 5th birthday, club members receive a gift with the club's congratulations. The award is given by a member of the board of directors or a person authorized to do so.
